borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2023/01643/FUL granted 9th January 2024 for the 'Erection of a rear roof extension, involving an increase in the ridge height by 330mm; erection of a rear extension at second floor level, on top of the existing back addition including the formation of a roof terrace on top of the back addition; erection of a single storey rear extension, to the side and rear of the existing back addition following the demolition of existing ground floor back addition; installation of a new door to provide access to the roof terrace at third floor level to the rear elevation; installation of 2no rooflights in the front roofslope and 1no rooflight above the main flat roof at roof level; alterations to the roof of single storey back addition' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: alterations to the pitched roof (side roof) of ground floor back addition, correction of the existing window to first floor rear back addition and reducing the depth of the ground floor rear extension by 400mm (part retrospective).
